entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:11 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 08:11 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:11 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
